title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Deepening a relationship with a colleague is a delightful surprise today. For instance, you might make dinner plans with a coworker after you discover that you share more common interests than either of you initially recognized. Similarly, a crisis also could show you that a friend means more to you than you previously noticed. Perhaps you may even develop romantic feelings for a buddy that goes beyond friendship. Trust that your bond can weather even the storminess of any confusion until a conversation guides you to clearer skies of mutual understanding. Opening your heart widens your world. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
